# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it by emailing the maintainers directly rather than opening a public issue.

Please include:

- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

We will respond within 48 hours and work with you to understand and address the issue.

## Security Updates

Security updates will be released as patch versions and announced in the repository's releases section.
